page.title: 08ST ANDREWS CHURCH,EXTERIOR
page.content: Our village church is called { {St Andrew's.}It was built in the eleventh century.The walls are made of stone,flint and bricks.The{Tower}was built in 1534 and is 80 feet high,its roof is made of lead.The outside of the tower is decorated with the { {de Vere star.}The tower has a clock,weather vane,flag pole and a bell on it.The porch faces South towards Colchester,Halstead is to the North.The church has 20 windows and 4 doors.THere are{2 lytch gates,} one faciing South,one facing North.The church is surrounded by 12 yew trees and a churchyard,which is no longer used for burials.There are 5 different kinds of cross in the churchyard.The stone carvings around the church are of Kings,Queens,Gargoyles and Flowers.The West door has a newly carved King's head on the right.
